quickcheck 0.0.1.9000

Function reference

Integer

A set of generators to produce integer vectors.

integer_() integer_bounded() integer_left_bounded() integer_right_bounded() integer_positive() integer_negative()
Integer generators

Double

A set of generators to produce double vectors.

double_() double_bounded() double_left_bounded() double_right_bounded() double_positive() double_negative() double_fractional() double_whole()
Double generators

Numeric

A set of generators to produce numeric vectors. A numeric vector will be an integer or a double vector.

numeric_() numeric_bounded() numeric_left_bounded() numeric_right_bounded() numeric_positive() numeric_negative()
Numeric generators

Character

A generator to produce character vectors.

character_()
Character generators

Logical

A generator to produce logical vectors.

logical_()
Logical generator

Date

A set of generators to produce date vectors.

date_() date_bounded() date_left_bounded() date_right_bounded()
Date generators

POSIXct

A set of generators to produce POSIXct vectors.

posixct_() posixct_bounded() posixct_left_bounded() posixct_right_bounded()
POSIXct generators

hms

A set of generators to produce hms vectors.

hms_() hms_bounded() hms_left_bounded() hms_right_bounded()
hms generators

Factor

A generator to produce factor vectors.

factor_()
Factor generator

List

A set of generators to produce lists.

list_()
List generator
list_of()
Variable length list generator
flat_list_of()
Variable length flat list generator

Tibble

A set of generators to produce tibbles.

tibble_()
Tibble generators
tibble_of()
Random tibble generator

Any

A set of generators to produce random values.

anything()
Any R object generator
any_atomic()
Atomic vector generator
any_list()
Random list generator
any_flat_list()
Flat list generator
any_flat_homogeneous_list()
Flat homogeneous list generator
any_vector()
Random vector generator
any_tibble()
Random tibble generator
any_undefined()
Undefined value generator

Other

Other generators and combinators.

one_of()
Randomly choose between generators
constant()
Generate the same value every time

Hedgehog

Convert a hedgehog generator to a quickcheck generator

from_hedgehog()
Convert a hedgehog generator to a quickcheck generator

Test runner

A function to run property based tests.

for_all()
Test properties of a function

Show example

Show an example output value from a generator

show_example()
Show an example output of a generator

On this page
